questions.title: 倘若你的实验对那些宠物狗不起作用怎么办？
questions.answer: What if your experiment doesn't work on pet dogs?

questions.title: 假如下雨时我们没有带雨伞怎么办？
questions.answer: What if it rains while we don't have umbrella?

questions.title: 假如你不是你父母的亲生女儿怎么办？
questions.answer: What if you are not your parents'real daughter?

questions.title: 倘若那个放在阁楼上的盒子掉下来砸伤汤姆的脑袋怎么办？
questions.answer: What if that empty box put in the garret comes down and crushes Tom'shead?

questions.title: 假如他不能和你一起呢？
questions.answer: What if he can't come with you?

title: ——倘若谈判在原则上不能退让怎么办？
——那么赢得一场漂亮的胜利。

answer.en: What if there is no concessions on matters of principle on negotiation?

title: ——倘若你的研究成果在一个月内没有人提出反对意见会怎么样？
——如果这样的话，我将会发表我的论文。

answer.en: What if nobody raises any objection about your research within onemonth?
If so, I will publish my thesis.

title: ——万一她忘记带来怎么办？
——那我们就只能在附近的超市买一个新的了。

answer.en: What if she forgets to bring it?
Well, we have to buy a new one in the supermarket nearby.
